content: POST response body successfully copied to clipboard

comment.text: The translation key "ResponseBodyCopied" is used to display a success message when the response body of an API request is copied to the clipboard. It appears in a textarea component within a developer tool, likely as a button label or tooltip.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'mübadilə buferinə' is a bit clunky. 'Mübadilə' refers to a swap/exchange. 'Clipboard' is more accurately translated as 'keçmiş bufer' or 'keçmiş xəbər'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: POST cavab mətni keçmiş buferə uğurla kopyalandı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Текстът на POST отговора е успешно копиран в клипборда' is a bit literal. A more natural translation might be 'POST отговорът е успешно копиран в клипборда.' The addition of 'Текстът на' isn't necessary and makes it sound less fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: POST отговорът е успешно копиран в клипборда

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'սեղմախտակում' (slegmaxhtakum) is an archaic term for clipboard. A more modern and widely understood term would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'փեղքագիր' (plegkaghir) which is a more commonly used term for clipboard in modern Armenian.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຄລິບບອດ' (clipboard) is written correctly but could be slightly clarified based on the target audience. A more descriptive term might enhance understanding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more explicit term for 'clipboard' if the target audience might not be familiar with the English word.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'área de transferência' is a literal translation of 'clipboard' and might not be the most natural or commonly used term in Brazilian Portuguese. While technically correct, 'área de transferência' sounds slightly formal and less intuitive for users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Corpo da resposta POST copiado para a área de copiar/colar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'clipboard' instead of the more common Romanian equivalent 'aglomează'. While 'clipboard' is understandable, it's not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Corpul răspunsului POST a fost copiat cu succes în aglomerează

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'POST ප්‍රතිචාරයේ අන්තර්ගතය පසුරු පුවරුවට පිටපත් විය' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'POST response body successfully copied to clipboard'. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat formal and clunky. 'POST response body' could be simplified. Also, 'success' isn't explicitly conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more conversational translation like: 'POST ප්‍රතිචාරයේ දත්ත පසුරු පුවරුවට පිටපත් කරන ලදී' or 'POST ප්‍රතිචාරයේ දත්ත ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් වෙත පිටපත් විය'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the individual words are spelled correctly, the overall phrasing might benefit from re-evaluation for flow and accuracy in a Sinhala context regarding technical terms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review terminology related to 'response body' and 'clipboard' to ensure it aligns with common Sinhala usage in technical documentation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'odložišče' is a valid term for clipboard but is less common and might not be immediately understood by all users. A more user-friendly and common term could improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Telo odgovora POST je bilo uspešno kopirano v sponko

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "привремену меморију" (temporary memory) isn't the most natural translation of "clipboard" in this context. It's too technical. A more user-friendly and accurate translation would be something like "клипоборд" (clipboard) or "свезке" (notebook/pad).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тело одговора POST захтева успешно копирано у клипоборд.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Telo odgovora POST zahteva uspešno kopirano u privremenu memoriju' is a literal translation and doesn't sound natural in Serbian. "Privremena memorija" (temporary memory) is not the typical way to describe the clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uspešno kopirano telo POST odgovora u isečanje.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'POST odgovora' could benefit from a hyphen to improve readability.

The translation "Тіло запиту POST успішно скопійовано до буфера обміну" is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the success of copying the response body.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Успішно скопійовано тіло відповіді POST у буфер обміну

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã sao chép thành công POST response body vào bộ nhớ tạm' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Vietnamese. The phrase 'bộ nhớ tạm' (temporary memory) isn't the typical way to refer to a clipboard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép POST response body thành công vào clipboard.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, maintaining consistency with English's use of 'POST response body' throughout the translation would improve readability and clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but consider the broader context to ensure consistency.
